original_title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Chipettes
overview: Introducing The Chipettes! America's favorite female Chipmunks stories in their very own DVD! Six fun-filled episodes featuring Brittany, Jeanette and Eleanor, and of course Alvin, Simon and Theodore! The Chipmunks hit the campaign trail for class president in May the Best Chipmunk Win. The hilarious antics continue in Operation Theodore, in which The Chipettes are hospital volunteers and Brittany will have to earn her candy stripes by taking care of a prankster patient. Plus don't miss four more episodes of music, excitement and fun. Get ready for a rockin' good time that only The Chipettes can deliver!
title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Chipettes
